channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat Bootloader Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat Bootloader Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-28737|2024-10-22T13:17:50.789Z -- red%20hat%20bootloader%20team -- shim
item.description: There's a possible overflow in handle_image() when shim tries to load and execute crafted EFI executables; The handle_image() function takes into account the SizeOfRawData field from each section to be loaded. An attacker can leverage this to perform out-of-bound writes into memory. Arbitrary code execution is not discarded in such scenario.
